text: Ribarroja Club de Fútbol is a Spanish football team based in Riba-roja de Túria, in the autonomous community of Valencia. Founded in 1942 it plays in Tercera División – Group 6, holding home games at Estadio Municipal de Ribarroja, which has a capacity of 3,000 spectators. ==Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=49%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !Season !Tier !Division !Place !Copa del Rey |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1942–89 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Regional |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|1989/90 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|4 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"|7th |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|1990/91 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|4 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"|16th |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|1991/92 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|4 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"|17th !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1992/93 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Reg.
